snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry headed to talks with his Russian counterpart, Sergey V. Lavrov, on how to secure and ultimately destroy Syria’s chemical weapons.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry heads to Geneva with a team of arms control experts for intensive talks with his Russian counterpart Sergey V Lavrov to try to reach agreement on how to secure and ultimately destroy Syria’s chemical weapons.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Jonathan Weisman and David E. Sanger from Washington, Victor Homola from Berlin, and Steven Erlanger from London.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry headed to talks with his Russian counterpart, Sergey V. Lavrov, on how to secure and ultimately destroy Syria’s chemical weapons.

headline.main: U.S. and Russia Far Apart on Eve of Talks Over Syria
headline.print_headline: U.S. and Russia Far Apart On Eve of Talks Over Syria
